import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaCalendarAlt, FaBook, FaUsers, FaClock, FaMapMarkerAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; function Home() { const [recentEvents, setRecentEvents] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchRecentEvents(); }, []); const fetchRecentEvents = async () => { try { const response = await fetch('/api/events?limit=3'); if (response.ok) { const data = await response.json(); setRecentEvents(data); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching recent events:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; return (

Welcome to Your Dashboard

Explore events, access resources, and stay connected with your college community.

Events

View upcoming events, workshops, and activities happening in your college.

Resources

Access study materials, previous year papers, and academic resources.

Community

Learn about our college community, clubs, and departments.

{/* Recent Events Section */}

Recent Events

) : recentEvents.length > 0 ? ( recentEvents.map((event) => (

{event.title}

{event.description}

{new Date(event.date).toLocaleDateString()}
{event.time}
{event.venue}
)) ) : (

No upcoming events at the moment.

); } export default Home;
